query:
UPDATE users
            SET email = COALESCE($2, email),
                display_name = COALESCE($3, display_name),
                updated_at = NOW()
            WHERE id = $1
            RETURNING
                id AS "id!",
                email AS "email!",
                display_name AS "display_name!",
                created_at AS "created_at!",
                updated_at AS "updated_at!"
